Hi and this comment it is to say that after unzipping it is more than a 300 mega application , the size it is possible because the 7zip great compression , i uploaded this file because no file fully working without problems is available for the moment for this application , i analised with carefull the aplication successfully working with portability and finally i did the compression , the intention is to be a valid option file for this application and happy DVDs and Blu-Rays work for all of you or maybe just for fun having your favourite movies available in nice menus in a distance of a click , only the user imagition is between the program and the computer ...
I wish a nice application without problems for all the downloaders ... have fun ...

Hi and this comment it is to say that this file works but with semi-portability , why? because Encore need to be installed and with that support files of the installation but after that this file will work fine with portability in any place you want on the computer , the effort still nice because the program get in many installations running problems , so not the ideal portability but at least it is a solution after any Encore installation , ok see you all around and happy software tools for all of you ...

To rumaca : hi there from seville , spain and that message you are showing it is exactly what i was talking about that happen without any normal installation and that´s why only the semi-portability , the file will work if you have any successfull for example Adobe Premiere Pro installed because the Encore is attached to the Adobe Premiere work and if you install and apply the crack dll on the Premiere Pro , you will notice that all the installations of the package can have all the attachments programs working unless the Encore that the dll don´t work no matter what and in the other programs from the Premiere package the crack work without problem and it was because this annoying situation that i uploaded this Encore file working but certain important registry information including shell integration of the files that Premiere and Encore works must be installed on the computer for this file be recognised , so if you install any of the Premiere Pro installations available this file will work with portability and you will notice that the crack available for Premiere works with all the programs of the package unless the Encore for some missing information on the Encore executable that makes that the cracked dll not work on this particular program but on this file all the necessary corrections happens to make the Adobe Encore work fine ... i hope this comment explained everything about the use of this file , inicially i tought was real portability then i detected that works fine but with semi-portability after the Premiere Pro for example is installed on the computer ... see you and happy tools for all of you .
